title: Hoteliers cash in on New Year festivities, no impact of COVID-19 resurgence
description: Domestic travel has also surged significantly, buoyed by ongoing weddings and festive engagements. The palpable enthusiasm within domestic travel is evident, showcasing a notable uptick, with hotels registering robust year-end occupancies, Federation of Hotel & Restaurant Associations of India (FHRAI) president-elect Pradeep Shetty said.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
